description:
MEET $BARNARD - the MEME: Mission Log. 
“Governance modules tweaked. New OPCodes installed. VM improvements ongoing.”

$BARNARD may be $ANDROMEDA’s brother, but he’s not here to race.
He’s here to steady the ship, fix the glitches, and make sure the data keeps flowing.
Curious, confused, but always ready to lend a hand.
